entry.title: Gotham’s Stray: The Soldier Out of Place
entry.summary:
Author: Leloudphantom

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,521Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Derek Archer wakes up on a roof after a Daring?? Escape, clothes burnt and singed, exhausted and hungry as fuck.Nothing looks familiar, then again the last time Derek was outside he was in Brazil enjoying a drink while on a assignment, and now he is in a depressing city with an interesting choice of architecture.and are those gunshots in the distance....

entry.title: Captive of the Demon's Head
entry.summary:
Author: Mrswas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,941Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 53

Summary: Bruce and Damian are taken by the League of Assassins. Bruce must do what he can to keep his son safe, even if it includes letting Talia have what she wants from him, mentally and physically.Also, the timeline and ages are slightly different than canon:League training at 17Talia drugs him at 22Damian is born when he is 23, he gets Damian at 30. Dick adopted at 8 when bruce is 19. Jason comes to the manor when hes 10 and Bruce is 25. Tim a couple years later (early adoption). Duke adopted at 12, Cass at 14, Steph at 14. Current agesBruce 33Dick 22Jason 18Tim 16Duke 14Damian 10Cass 17Oracle 23Steph 16

entry.title: The Hundred Day Curse
entry.summary:
Author: SolaceInSpace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 110,659Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 2,709

Summary: Gotham was literally cursed but no one believed Bruce. He took it upon himself to fix it and after decades of searching, that solution came to him in the form of a little blue vial. Bruce was to take the curse within himself to temper it into something manageable.He thinks the others would call him stupid and stop him if they knew about this, but (un)fortunately for Bruce, his family hasn't spoken to him for forever. There was no one here to stop him.He downed the liquid and woke up as his nine-year-old self.Ch3 Excerpt:“Mother, do you remember those funny clouds above people’s heads I told you about? Well, I’m doing something about them but the process is very lonely. Or not. I think it’s just me. I’m the problem. I can’t seem to get people to like me enough to stay. I know–-… I’m aware that it’s due to my own shortcomings but sometimes, it feels like even the worst monsters have people that love them and yet I have no one.”Bruce let out a humourless chuckle and rested his forehead on his knees.“I just wish there was someone that cared about me.”

entry.title: The Heroes I Raised
entry.summary:
Author: Sweet_Ru07

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,125Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 126

Summary: when a new magical threat arrives in Gotham, all it's heroes gather to confront it despite their strained relationship with one another. however, despite their best efforts, tragedy strikes. And Bruce Wayne, surrounded by the bodies of his children, is given a chance to try again. with his dying breath he vows, he will do better, no matter what it takes, he will save them this time.This fic is inspired by the webtoon "The S-Classes Raised" but does not require prior knowledge of it, this is my first time writing for these characters and I accept any constructive criticisms. will update the tags as I go

entry.title: Batfamily Acidemia
entry.summary:
Author: Don454132Nie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,830Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 135

Summary: Batman and his team the Batfamily are having a normal night in Gotham City stopping villain's like Victor Zsasz when suddenly the group head out to stop a recently escaped Joker who ends up using a Device he was given by his villain "Friend" Lex Luthor that can open portals to other universes. Joker ends up sending himself, his underlings, the Batfamily, and several other villain's to another world where 80% of the population have superpowers called quirks. Now Batman must work with the number 1 hero of this worlds japan and his apprentice Izuku Midoriya to get home and stop Joker, Penguin, Two-Face, and any new allies they may find.ORThe Batfamily and several DC villain's end up in the world of MHA and Midoriya and Damian end up going to UA together while Joker, Punchline, and Scarecrow join up with the L.O.V.

entry.summary:
Author: BritishRobutt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,914Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 332

Summary: The last thing Alex Mercer sees of his New York is the bright flare of detonation as he drops the nuke into the Atlantic Ocean. Instead of dying, he wakes up to a different world with superheroes, magic, and aliens. Can someone who is both less and more than human rediscover himself and his place in the dark streets of Gotham?

entry.title: This Is Me Trying|| Clark Kent. Female Bruce Wayne.
entry.summary:
Author: XOastorybynatxoxo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,026Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 57

Summary: "I've been having a hard time adjustingI had the shiniest wheels, now they're rustingI didn't know if you'd care if I came backI have a lot of regrets about thatPulled the car off the road to the lookoutCould've followed my fears all the way downAnd maybe I don't quite know what to sayBut I'm here in your doorwayI just wanted you to knowThat this is me tryingI just wanted you to knowThat this is me trying"- This Is Me Trying, Taylor SwiftOR IN WHICHGotham would never be saved by a woman. So the only daughter of Martha and Thomas Wayne dones the Cape and Cowl and becomes The Batman.Female Bruce Wayne x Clark Kent.AU- No particular timeline.

entry.title: Of Coffe and Flowers(I won't run when it looks like Love)
entry.summary:
Author: InLoveWithaFairyTale

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,971Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 50

Summary: Jason Todd had nothing to live for exept spite and Gotham, maybe the Outlaws and his family counted too, not that he would admit it to anyone, least of all himself.He didn't deserve to be loved, he would NEVER risk anyone getting tangled up in his life and risk getting hurt, by him and the people that he'd made enemies with as Red Hood.He would never... Or so he though when He stumbled across a plant Cafe and his whole world did a flip.Jason found himself saying and doing things He never would have imagined
